title: Mini-Ep 93: Little White Lies
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 93: Little White Lies
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate and Doree discuss a listener’s struggles with telling white lies, hear how some listeners are fighting diet culture in their workplaces, and share an email that poses a very important question: Is it okay to pee in the shower?To leav...
description:
This week, Kate and Doree discuss a listener’s struggles with telling white lies, hear how some listeners are fighting diet culture in their workplaces, and share an email that poses a very important question: Is it okay to pee in the shower?


To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • CHARLOTTE TILBURY - Charlotte Tilbury is shoppable directly from CharlotteTilbury.com!
  • MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.
  • MODERN FERTILITY - Get $20 off your test when you go to ModernFertility.com/forever35.
  • PRETTY LITTER - For 20% off your first order visit prettylitter.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • ROTHY’S - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.
  • SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Real-life isn’t always perfect, but with Signature Hardware it’s beautiful. Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
